Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32067 affecting package grpc for versions less than 1.62.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-32067 affecting package grpc for versions less than 1.62.0-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package grpc is earlier than 1.62.0-2, affected by CVE-2023-32067
